info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:41PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Nolan and west central Taylor Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camp Butman, or near Nolan. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nolan, Lake Sweetwater and Camp Butman. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 248 and 260. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
